content:
From: Lars Hupel <hupel@in.tum.de>
Dear Isabelle users,

not everyone will see this message in time, but I'll try anyway â€“ there
seems to be a partial network outage at TUM. This appears to affect:

  • mail services, including [isabelle-dev]
  • Jenkins
  • AFP website

Pushes to the repositories should be unaffected. I don't know when this
will be resolved.

Cheers
Lars
